title: SyntaxError: Using //@ to indicate sourceURL pragmas is deprecated. Use //# instead
summary: The JavaScript warning "Using //@ to indicate sourceURL pragmas is deprecated. Use //# instead" occurs when there is a deprecated source map syntax in a JavaScript source.
short_title: SyntaxError: Using //@ to indicate sourceURL pragmas is deprecated. Use //# instead
